feed.title: Kaushal Kumar
feed.subtitle: Hey there, Thank you for stopping by. This is a small blog to document my AWS Cloud Learnings and Some Tricks. Please reach out to me via my email, in case of any issues or concerns. I am around.

entry.title: Virtul Private Cloud
entry.content:
Hello There

Networking - VPC

Section Introduction

We need to know in and out how to create, operate and manage the VPC for network guidelines.

We will focus on Amazon VPC and AWS Direcr Connect in this section.

CIDR, Private vs Public IP

CIDR - Classless Inter-Domain Routing
